pageContext.claim: “I had good support from Muslims during my presidential run. And I think I have good support right now.”
pageContext.analysis: A Council on American-Islamic Relations report examined exit polling from the 2016 election. Polling 2,000 registered Muslim voters, they found only 13 percent supported President Trump. A January 2018 Gallup poll found just 18 percent of Muslims approve of the president's performance. Neither number suggests the president has anything close to "good support" in the Muslim community.
